info.title: Google Calendar
info.description: Build apps that can edit, create and delete Google Calendar events and invitations.

get.description: Clears a primary calendar. This operation deletes all data associated with the primary calendar of an account and cannot be undone.

parameters.name: calendarId
parameters.description: Calendar identifier.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

parameters.name: iCalUID
parameters.description: Specifies iCalendar UID (iCalUID) of events to be included in the response.

parameters.name: maxAttendees
parameters.description: The maximum number of attendees to include in the response. If there are more than the specified number of attendees, only the participant is returned.

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: Maximum number of events returned on one result page.

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: The order of the events returned in the result.

parameters.name: pageToken
parameters.description: Token specifying which result page to return.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Free text search terms to find events that match these terms in any field, except for extended properties.

parameters.name: showDeleted
parameters.description: Whether to include deleted events (with 'eventStatus' equals 'cancelled') in the result.

parameters.name: showHiddenInvitations
parameters.description: Whether to include hidden invitations in the result.

parameters.name: singleEvents
parameters.description: Whether to expand recurring events into instances and only return single one-off events and instances of recurring events, but not the underlying recurring events themselves.

parameters.name: timeMax
parameters.description: Upper bound (exclusive) for an event's start time to filter by. Optional. The default is not to filter by start time.

parameters.name: timeMin
parameters.description: Lower bound (inclusive) for an event's end time to filter by. Optional. The default is not to filter by end time.

parameters.name: timeZone
parameters.description: Time zone used in the response. The default is the time zone of the calendar.

parameters.name: updatedMin
parameters.description: Lower bound for an event's last modification time (as a RFC 3339 timestamp) to filter by. Optional. The default is not to filter by last modification time.

get.description: Returns events on the specified calendar.

parameters.name: sendNotifications
parameters.description: Whether to send notifications about the creation of the new event.

parameters.description: Specifies Content Type.

parameters.description: The maximum number of attendees to include in the response. If there are more than the specified number of attendees, only the participant is returned.

parameters.name: timeZone
parameters.description: Time zone used in the response. The default is the time zone of the calendar.

parameters.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

parameters.name: sendNotifications
parameters.description: Whether to send notifications about the event update (e.g. attendee's responses, title changes, etc.).

parameters.name: originalStart
parameters.description: The original start time of the instance in the result.

parameters.name: pageToken

parameters.name: showDeleted
